title: Quilt, 1840
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: roller printed on plain weave
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Ralph  P. Hanes
description: Straight repeat of Chinese-style figures flanking a Chinese-style urn containing flowers. The quilted pattern is a "fish scale" for field and borders. A cotton thread of various light tones used for quilting.

tombstone.epitaph:
Quilt, 1840.
1840. Medium: cotton
Technique: roller printed on plain weave. Gift of Mrs. Ralph  P. Hanes. 1978-167-1.
